verses.text: Give ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w my|strong="H3068"\w* cry come \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

Let not \w your|strong="H3068"\w* face \w be|strong="H3068"\w* veiled \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* trouble; \w give|strong="H8085"\w* ear \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* let \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w cry|strong="H7775"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H8085"\w* quickly.

\w My|strong="H5641"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* wasted \w like|strong="H6440"\w* smoke, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H5641"\w* bones \w are|strong="H3117"\w* burned \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* fire.

\w My|strong="H3588"\w* heart \w is|strong="H3117"\w* broken; \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3117"\w* become dry \w and|strong="H3117"\w* dead like grass, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* give no thought \w to|strong="H3117"\w* food.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* sorrow, \w my|strong="H3588"\w* flesh \w is|strong="H3820"\w* wasted \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* bone.

\w I|strong="H6963"\w* am like \w a|strong="H1320"\w* bird \w living|strong="H1320"\w* by \w itself|strong="H6106"\w* \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* waste places; like \w the|strong="H6963"\w* night-bird \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w a|strong="H1320"\w* waste \w of|strong="H6963"\w* sand.
\w I|strong="H1961"\w* keep watch \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* bird \w by|strong="H1961"\w* itself \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* house-top.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* haters say evil \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* all day; \w those|strong="H5921"\w* who \w are|strong="H1961"\w* violent \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* make \w use|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* name \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* curse.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3117"\w* dust \w for|strong="H3117"\w* bread \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* drink \w has|strong="H3117"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* mixed \w with|strong="H3117"\w* weeping:

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3899"\w* \w your|strong="H0398"\w* passion \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w your|strong="H0398"\w* wrath, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* been lifted \w up|strong="H0398"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w then|strong="H3588"\w* made low \w by|strong="H0398"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3588"\w* days \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* shade which \w is|strong="H6440"\w* stretched \w out|strong="H6440"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am dry \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* grass.

\w But|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w*, \w O|strong="H0589"\w* Lord, \w are|strong="H3117"\w* eternal; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5186"\w* name \w will|strong="H0589"\w* never come \w to|strong="H3117"\w* an end.

\w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* again get \w up|strong="H3427"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* Zion: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H5769"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* come \w for|strong="H3068"\w* her \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* comforted.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H0935"\w* servants \w take|strong="H0935"\w* pleasure \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H0935"\w* stones, looking \w with|strong="H0935"\w* \w love|strong="H7355"\w* \w on|strong="H0935"\w* \w her|strong="H0935"\w* dust.

\w So|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* nations \w will|strong="H5650"\w* give honour \w to|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* name \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* kings \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* fear \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* glory:

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* put \w up|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* walls \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*;

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* given ear \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* prayer \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* poor, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* put \w his|strong="H3068"\w* request \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* side.

This \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* put \w in|strong="H0413"\w* writing \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* coming generation, \w and|strong="H6437"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* future \w will|strong="H3808"\w* give praise \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord.

\w For|strong="H3789"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H5971"\w* holy place \w the|strong="H3050"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w* \w has|strong="H3050"\w* seen, looking \w down|strong="H3789"\w* \w on|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H3050"\w* earth \w from|strong="H5971"\w* heaven;

Hearing \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cry \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* prisoner, making free \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* whom death \w is|strong="H3068"\w* ordered;

\w So|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H8085"\w* \w may|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H8085"\w* out \w the|strong="H8085"\w* name \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Zion, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* praise \w in|strong="H8085"\w* Jerusalem;

\w When|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* peoples \w are|strong="H3068"\w* come together, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* kingdoms, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* give worship \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* taken \w my|strong="H3068"\w* strength \w from|strong="H3068"\w* me \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* way; \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H5647"\w* short \w my|strong="H3068"\w* days.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* say, O \w my|strong="H3117"\w* God, take \w me|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* away \w before|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*; \w your|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w* go \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w through|strong="H1870"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* generations:

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* past \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w earth|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w its|strong="H5927"\w* base, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* heavens \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* work \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H0559"\w* hands.

\w They|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* come \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* end, but \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* still go \w on|strong="H0776"\w*; \w they|strong="H0776"\w* all \w will|strong="H0776"\w* become \w old|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* coat, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H0776"\w* robe \w they|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* changed:

\w But|strong="H0859"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* unchanging \w One|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* years \w will|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w no|strong="H0006"\w* end.

\w The|strong="H3808"\w* children \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* servants \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H0859"\w* \w a|strong="H3808"\w* safe resting-place, \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* seed \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* ever \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w*.
